name: Tiki Tunes
description:
Two raccoons were sniffing glue by some trash bins when all of the sudden two plane tickets to Hawaii fall from the sky. After giving it no thought, they jump into the plane to sniff some exotic glue and eat some exotic snacks.

Too bad the plane landed in the middle of one of the islands, leaving them stranded away from the beaches and even more exotic goods. To get there, our two little mischievous mammals decide to hijack a shopping cart and some fire extinguishers in hopes to getting to the coast!

With the help of a local store, Tiki Tunes, will you be able to lead these raccoons to their goal?

How to Play

Tiki Tunes is an incremental infinite runner where you control two raccoons who got stuck in the interior of Hawaii after stealing a shopping cart. Your objective is to go further and further with your shopping cart, collecting fruit baskets, fire extinguisher fuel and your beloved sniffing glue.

Each has it's own effect:

  • Fruit baskets - they allow you to go acquire currency to spend on upgrades
  • Fire extinguishers - they refill part of the fuel you've spent
  • Sniffing glue - buffs up one of your raccoons, making you spend 0 fuel for  the duration of the high
Controls
  • SPEED - spacebar
